summary: In search of help, two wounded gangsters on the run find refuge in the secluded castle of a feeble man and his wife; however, under the point of a gun, nothing is what it seems.
cast: Donald Pleasence|Françoise Dorléac|Lionel Stander|Jack MacGowran|Iain Quarrier|Geoffrey Sumner|Renee Houston|Robert Dorning|Marie Kean|William Franklyn|Jacqueline Bisset|Trevor Delaney
title: Callejón sin salida
